annotations.description: A template for docker builds for the Alice sovrin-indy example application in OpenShift.

parameters.name: BUILD_NAME
parameters.description: The name given to the build.

parameters.name: SOURCE_IMAGE_KIND
parameters.description: The 'kind' (type) of the  source image; typically ImageStreamTag, or DockerImage.

parameters.name: SOURCE_IMAGE_NAME
parameters.description: The name of the source image.

parameters.name: SOURCE_IMAGE_TAG
parameters.description: The tag of the source image.

parameters.name: OUTPUT_IMAGE_NAME
parameters.description: The name given to the built image.

parameters.name: OUTPUT_IMAGE_TAG
parameters.description: The tag given to the built image.

parameters.name: TEMPLATE_NAME
parameters.description: The name of this template.

parameters.name: SOURCE_CONTEXT_DIR
parameters.description: The source context directory.

parameters.name: GIT_REF
parameters.description: The git referance or branch.

parameters.name: GIT_URI
parameters.description: The git Uri.

parameters.name: DOCKER_FILE_PATH
parameters.description: The path to the docker file.

parameters.name: SOVRIN_NODE_NAME
parameters.description: The name of the sovrin node.  This is injected into the docker build.  Only used for sovrin node builds; all other builds ignore this parameter.

parameters.name: SOVRIN_NODE_PORT
parameters.description: The port to be used by the sovrin node.  This is injected into the docker build.  Only used for sovrin node builds; all other builds ignore this parameter.

parameters.name: SOVRIN_CLIENT_PORT
parameters.description: The client port to be used by the sovrin node.  This is injected into the docker build.  Only used for sovrin node builds; all other builds ignore this parameter.

parameters.name: SOVRIN_NODE_IP_LIST
parameters.description: The list of IP addresses for the sovrin nodes.  This is injected into the docker build.  Used for sovrin node and client builds; all other builds ignore this parameter.

parameters.name: SOVRIN_NODE_NUMBER
parameters.description: The number of the sovrin node.  This is injected into the docker build.  Only used for sovrin node builds; all other builds ignore this parameter.

parameters.name: SOVRIN_NODE_COUNT
parameters.description: The number of sovrin nodes.  This is injected into the docker build.  Used for sovrin node and client builds; all other builds ignore this parameter.

parameters.name: SOVRIN_CLIENT_COUNT
parameters.description: The number of sovrin Clients.  This is injected into the docker build.  Used for sovrin node and client builds; all other builds ignore this parameter.

parameters.name: SOVRIN_AGENT_NAME
parameters.description: The name of the sovrin agent.  This is injected into the docker build.  Used for sovrin agent builds; all other builds ignore this parameter.

parameters.name: SOVRIN_AGENT_PORT
parameters.description: The port on which the sovrin agent will listen.  This is injected into the docker build.  Used for sovrin agent builds; all other builds ignore this parameter.
